com.spacetimecat.web.servlet.logic

Interface Logic

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    First, FunctionalJsonLogic, Gzip, If, IfMethod, IfNot, IfPathInfo, NotAcceptable, NotFound, Static, Throw
    Functional Interface:
    This is a functional interface and can therefore be used as the assignment target for a lambda expression or method reference.

    @FunctionalInterface
public interface Logic

    Match a request and respond if the request matches.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean handle(javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest request, javax.servlet.http.HttpServletResponse response)
      Like serviceHttp but returns a boolean.

    • Method Detail

      • handle

        boolean handle(javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest request,
               javax.servlet.http.HttpServletResponse response)
        throws java.io.IOException,
               javax.servlet.ServletException

        Like serviceHttp but returns a boolean.

        If this wants to write the response body, this must use only getOutputStream. It must not use getWriter.

        This must not flush the output stream.

        If this returns false, this must not modify the response.

        Parameters:
        request - request; assume that this is immutable
        response - mutable response; the method works by mutating this response
        Returns:
        whether this logic matches (handles) the request. If this is true, processing stops and the response will be sent. If this is false, the response must not be modified.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException
        javax.servlet.ServletException
